feed.title: Daniele Tabellini - Portfolio
feed.subtitle: Principal Designer / Artist / Adj. Professor in Digital Experience Lab at Design UNIRSM

entry.title: Guida di stile
entry.content:
1. headings (h2)
    1. List
      1. Styles
        1. Table md

          headings (h2)

          h3

          h4

          h5
          h6

          List

          Simple

          • List item
          • list iten
          • list item

          Numbered

          1. numbered list item
          2. numbered list item
          3. numbered list item

          Styles

          Bold and italic

          Code inline

          You'll want to run really_cool_script.sh arg.
          Pay attention to the foo_bar_whammy field in that table.

          Code block with highlight

          def Foo(self, bar):
  self.bar = bar

          See the syntax guide for more info: link.
          Or, check out the style guide here.

          Table md

          Fruit Attribute Notes
          Apple Juicy, Firm, Sweet Apples keep doctors away.
          Banana Convenient, Soft, Sweet Contrary to popular belief, most apes prefer mangoes.

          Another table

          Transport Favored by Advantages
          Swallow Coconuts Otherwise unladen
          Bicycle Miss Gulch Weatherproof
          X-34 landspeeder Whiny farmboys Cheap since the X-38 came out

entry.title: Style guide
entry.content:
headings (h2)

h3

h4

h5
h6

List

Simple

  • List item
  • list iten
  • list item

Numbered

  1. numbered list item
  2. numbered list item
  3. numbered list item

Styles

Bold and italic

Code inline

You'll want to run really_cool_script.sh arg.
Pay attention to the foo_bar_whammy field in that table.

Code block with highlight

def Foo(self, bar):
  self.bar = bar

See the syntax guide for more info: link.
Or, check out the style guide here.

Table md

Fruit Attribute Notes
Apple Juicy, Firm, Sweet Apples keep doctors away.
Banana Convenient, Soft, Sweet Contrary to popular belief, most apes prefer mangoes.

Another table

Transport Favored by Advantages
Swallow Coconuts Otherwise unladen
Bicycle Miss Gulch Weatherproof
X-34 landspeeder Whiny farmboys Cheap since the X-38 came out
